quotes.quote: Ask not what's inside your head but what your head's inside of.
Success on the outside indeed begins with success on the inside.
Real happiness comes from inside. Nobody can give it to you.
Somewhere inside all of us is the power to change the world.
What happens inside always appears outside.
Real beauty exists inside the heart,not over the face.
Inside the peach, there is a stone.
Inside a soul, there's a hero to discover.
Sometimes we have to go deep inside ourselves to solve our problems.
Inside us there is something that has no name, that something is what we are.
All of us have at least one great voice deep inside.
The only power that exists is inside ourselves.
People act on the outside the way they feel on the inside.
You are safe inside your mind. No one can reach you there.
Inside everyone is a great shout of joy waiting to be born.
But inside us there is a word we cannot pronounce and that is who we are.
Stop searching here and there, the jewels are inside you.
Deep inside us we're not that different at all.
Deep down inside we're all the same. We all have the same emotions.
If you follow the voice inside you, it does give you guidance.
Inside any deep asking is the answering.
Start from your heart. The greatest journeys begin on the inside.
You really have to look inside yourself to find your inner strength.
Because you cannot see outside of you what you fail to see inside.
You don't know what's on the inside until you put a demand on your potential.
There is more inside you than you dare think.
Everyone has darkness inside them, however hidden.
Don't try to control what's outside. Be at peace with what's inside.
We are all alike, on the inside.
Life is lived on the inside. What's outside doesn't matter.
You have to rely on whatever sparks you have inside.
Happiness is inside you, not with another person.
Inside every seed is the potential for an incredible harvest.
You cannot be brave if you do not have a coward inside you.
Inside each of us is a David and a Goliath.
There are secret opportunities hidden inside every failure.
